governance.chain: L0 Human → L1 LDS Kernel V1 → L2 Proposer

files: SAINT_ADMIN.lds.json — Admin console with user management (create, edit, deactivate, reset password), 4 system setting groups (general, security, notifications, data), searchable audit log viewer with export, platform health monitoring (7 metrics) with alerting.

SAINT_BILLING.lds.json — Subscription management with 4 plans ($500-$15K/month) matching SAINT_MASTER_INDEX pricing model, 4 add-ons, Stripe integration (subscriptions, payments, invoicing, usage metering), 4 usage meters (API, storage, drawings, users), limit enforcement with grace period.

SAINT_INTEGRATIONS.lds.json — 7 pre-built connectors (Salesforce, Procore, PlanGrid, Bluebeam, Microsoft 365, QuickBooks, Slack), integration setup wizard, health monitoring with 6 metrics, sync logging, custom integration support via SAINT_API, field mapping editor.
key_features_delivered: User management: create, edit, deactivate, reactivate, password reset, activity history
System settings: 4 groups with security config (session timeout, MFA, IP whitelist)
Audit log viewer: search, filter, export, real-time stream (IV.06, IV.07, IV.08)
Platform health: 7 monitors (entities, kernel latency, API, sessions, storage, scraper, webhooks)
Health alerting: critical/warning/info alerts via email and in-app
4 pricing plans: Contractor ($500), Engineer ($2K), Sales ($3K), Enterprise ($15K)
4 add-ons: extra storage, API requests, shop drawings, priority support
Stripe integration: subscriptions, payment methods, invoicing, usage metering, proration
4 usage meters: API requests, storage, shop drawings, active users
Limit enforcement: soft warning at 80%, hard limit at 100% with 5% grace
7 pre-built connectors: Salesforce, Procore, PlanGrid, Bluebeam, M365, QuickBooks, Slack
Integration setup wizard: auth → mapping → frequency → test → activate
Field mapping editor: visual SAINT ↔ external field mapping
Integration health monitoring: 6 metrics with auto-pause on 3 consecutive failures
Sync logging: per-integration sync history with error drill-down
Custom integration support via SAINT_API and webhooks

gcp_admin.SAINT_ADMIN: Full access — users, settings, audit log, health
gcp_admin.SAINT_BILLING: Full access — subscription, invoices, payment methods
gcp_admin.SAINT_INTEGRATIONS: Full access — configure, monitor, manage integrations

architecture_integrity.kernel_governance: All 18 entities validate through SAINT_KERNEL CHECK-THEN-ACT
architecture_integrity.role_boundaries: All 4 roles (gcp_admin, gcp_engineer, sales_rep, contractor) have defined access per entity
architecture_integrity.data_isolation: Contractor data isolation (VR-SAINT-004) enforced across all contractor-facing entities
architecture_integrity.territory_compliance: Territory filtering (VR-SAINT-003) enforced in scraper, pipeline, and territories
architecture_integrity.product_integrity: Product catalog validation (VR-SAINT-001) enforced in shop drawings and product config
architecture_integrity.warranty_boundary: Warranty eligibility (VR-SAINT-002) enforced in warranty and product config
architecture_integrity.cad_standards: CAD layer naming (VR-SAINT-005) enforced in shop drawings
architecture_integrity.audit_trail: Every kernel decision logged (IV.06, IV.07, IV.08) — queryable in admin audit viewer
architecture_integrity.fail_closed: All entities default to DENIED for unknown actions (IV.02)

assembly_ready.description: All 18 entity definition files are complete. The SAINT_ASSEMBLER can now extract code from all entities, resolve imports, and produce a deployable application.
assembly_ready.next_step: Create SAINT_ASSEMBLER.lds.json — extracts react_component code from all 18 entities, resolves cross-entity dependencies, generates package.json, configures Railway backend + Vercel frontend (or all-Railway), and produces deployable artifact.

checklist.item: All entities follow LDS entity schema pattern
All entities have react_component block with exports
All entities have demo_data for demo mode
All entities have backend API endpoints defined
Role access defined for all 4 roles across all 18 entities
All entity filenames match SAINT_MASTER_INDEX.lds.json manifest
All 5 kernel validation rules exercised across entities
All 8 invariants enforceable across the full entity set
Pricing model in billing matches SAINT_MASTER_INDEX pricing_model
